text.more:
A network map with context codes (n = 9), articles (n = 122), and links between articles and context codes (n = 156). Numbers refer to each article’s number (see the Supplemental Material [157]). Size of nodes is proportional to the number of the node’s connections. Colors indicate the thematic category assigned to each article.
From Palmgren et al 2025.
text.intro: A network map with context codes (n = 9), articles (n = 122), and links between articles and context codes (n = 156). Numbers refer to each article’s number (see the Supplemental Material [157]). Size of nodes is proportional to the number of the node’s connections. Colors indicate the thematic category assigned to each article.
